name: corsair
description: Extended Corsair iCUE plugin for G-Assist. Control lighting, DPI, EQ, cooling, profiles, and actions on Corsair devices.

functions.name: corsair_change_keyboard_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the keyboard's LEDs

color.description: the color (red, green, blue, cyan, magenta, yellow, white, orange, purple, pink, teal, gold, off, bright_up, bright_down)

functions.name: corsair_change_mouse_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the mouse's LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_headphone_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the headset's LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_headset_stand_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the headset stand LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_mousemat_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the mousemat LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_fan_controller_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the fans LEDs attached to the fan controller

functions.name: corsair_change_led_controller_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the LED devices attached to the led controller

functions.name: corsair_change_cooler_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the cooler LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_dram_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the DRAM LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_motherboard_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the motherboard LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_gpu_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the GPU LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_touchbar_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the touchbar device LEDs

functions.name: corsair_change_gamepad_lights
functions.description: Changes the color of the gamepad LEDs

functions.name: corsair_activate_profile
functions.description: Changes the active profile on iCUE

functions.name: corsair_get_profiles_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the profiles in iCUE

functions.name: corsair_activate_action
functions.description: Activates the action from the iCUE library

functions.name: corsair_get_actions_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the actions in iCUE library

functions.name: corsair_activate_cooling_preset
functions.description: Changes the active cooling preset on the user's Corsair cooling device. Automatically uses the connected device - no device name needed.

functions.name: corsair_get_cooling_presets_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the cooling presets for available cooling devices in iCUE

functions.name: corsair_activate_equalizer_preset
functions.description: Changes the active equalizer preset on the user's Corsair headset. Automatically uses the connected headset - no device name needed.

functions.name: corsair_get_equalizer_presets_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the equalizer presets for available headset devices in iCUE

functions.name: corsair_activate_dpi_preset
functions.description: Changes the active DPI preset on the user's Corsair mouse. Automatically uses the connected mouse - no device name needed.

functions.name: corsair_get_dpi_presets_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the DPI presets for the mice devices in iCUE

functions.name: corsair_activate_dpi_stage
functions.description: Changes the active DPI stage on the user's Corsair mouse. Automatically uses the connected mouse - no device name needed.

functions.name: corsair_activate_dpi_sniper_stage
functions.description: Activates the sniper DPI stage on the user's Corsair mouse. Automatically uses the connected mouse - no device name needed.

functions.name: corsair_set_dpi_stage_value
functions.description: Sets the DPI value on the user's Corsair mouse. Automatically uses the connected mouse - no device name needed. Use this when user says 'set my DPI to X' or 'change mouse sensitivity to X'.

functions.name: corsair_get_dpi_stages_list
functions.description: Provides the list of the DPI stages for the mice devices in iCUE
